description.zh: Passbolt 是一个面向团队的开源密码管理工具。它支持安全共享和管理凭证，采用强加密技术，并提供用户友好的界面。该工具支持基于角色的访问控制，并可与常见的开发和认证工具集成。
description.en: Passbolt is an open-source password manager designed for teams. It allows secure sharing and management of credentials with strong encryption and user-friendly interfaces. The tool supports role-based access control and integrates with common development and authentication tools.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 开源且透明的安全模型
- 面向团队协作设计，支持基于角色的权限管理
- 与现有开发流程无缝集成

## 功能列表:

- 支持团队成员之间安全共享密码
- 端到端强加密
- 基于角色的访问控制（RBAC）
- 支持 Chrome、Firefox 和 Edge 的浏览器扩展
- 提供用于自动化和集成的 RESTful API
- 支持自托管和云托管部署
- 支持双因素身份验证
- 密码策略强制执行
- 操作日志与审计追踪
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Open-source and transparent security model
- Designed for team collaboration with role-based permissions
- Seamless integration with existing development workflows

## Features:

- Secure password sharing among team members
- Strong end-to-end encryption
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Browser extensions for Chrome, Firefox, and Edge
- RESTful API for automation and integration
- Self-hosted and cloud-hosted deployment options
- Two-factor authentication support
- Password policy enforcement
- Activity logging and audit trails
